title: How to Defeat Kefka in Final Fantasy VI

steps.headline: Make three parties of these characters: <Terra-Locke-Cyan><Gau-Celes><figaro brothers>.
Defeat all the soldiers with your characters.
steps.description: There will be the guard (the Hell Rider) after you kill all the soldiers. Kill the him with the brothers.

steps.headline: Get a tintablum on Gau.
steps.description: Walk to Kefka as Gau. Let Gau use the Bomb Rage and Celes Runic. At some point he will be dead. Then go to another scene and find more tools on Figaro Castle.

steps.headline: Be sure you have an average team of level of 45 or above.
steps.description: This is not in stone, but it is recommended.

steps.headline: Equip these spells to facilitate the process: Quick, Ultima, and possibly Valor.
steps.description: Equip Ultima Weapon on the person that has the highest HP in your party.

steps.headline: Have a good team.
steps.description: A recommended team would be made up of: Celes, Edgar, Sabin, and Relm. Use whatever works for you! Some good magic users are: Relm, Celes, Terra, Mog, and Strago.

steps.headline: Equip a Celestriad and a Soul of Thamasa.
steps.description: He/she must know Quick, and have at least 50 magic or above. Use Quick, Ultima, and then the Soul of Thamasa in battle. This will allow you to cast two more spells in one turn. It all costs 1 MP.

steps.headline: Have a strong physical attacker and equip the Master's Scroll and the Genji Glove.
steps.description: Use Quick for your physical attacker, then attack. If done correctly, the person will attack eight times. This will also kill Kefka in one turn.
